originalText.text: I found Uri Schneider to be a superb clinician as well as  an outstanding person! His charisma, warmth, passion for the field, and compassion for the client, produce remarkable results that I was privileged to witness in a member of my family. I would highly recommend Schneider Speech for any and all speech related needs.

text.text: I found Uri Schneider to be a superb clinician as well as  an outstanding person! His charisma, warmth, passion for the field, and compassion for the client, produce remarkable results that I was privileged to witness in a member of my family. I would highly recommend Schneider Speech for any and all speech related needs.

originalText.text: Uri and his team at Schneider Speech have an expertise in stuttering that is unmatched. Their team quickly responds to phone calls, answers all questions, and provides solutions. They treat your family as their own family, and go above and beyond to meet any and all expectations. Doing so with the utmost professionalism. Highly recommend.

text.text: Uri and his team at Schneider Speech have an expertise in stuttering that is unmatched. Their team quickly responds to phone calls, answers all questions, and provides solutions. They treat your family as their own family, and go above and beyond to meet any and all expectations. Doing so with the utmost professionalism. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: After years and virtually no results with seeing many speech therapists who would try to fit me into their “cookie cutter” practice and solutions for speech, I finally found Schneider Speech. They listened to me, learned about my goals and struggles, and tailored my sessions to just what I needed. The biggest difference you will see when working with Schneider speech is they have the ability to procure a combination of therapies to help you reach your goals instead of a narrow minded approach. To this day, Uri is a friend and mentor, and I’m incredibly grateful I chose Schneider speech

originalText.text: Uri has been super helpful in my stuttering journey. He truly cares about his clients and goes above and beyond to customize an approach that works for them. Even though I haven't seen Uri for about a year now, he still frequently reaches out to check-in, share resources, and catch-up more generally. Would definitely recommend Schneider Speech!

text.text: Uri has been super helpful in my stuttering journey. He truly cares about his clients and goes above and beyond to customize an approach that works for them. Even though I haven't seen Uri for about a year now, he still frequently reaches out to check-in, share resources, and catch-up more generally. Would definitely recommend Schneider Speech!

originalText.text:
Our family has been working with Uri Schneider for about a year now.   We originally approached Uri to help us understand how to best support our child's disfluency.

Along the way, he helped our family take a more centered emotional approach to navigating disfluency -- the ups, the downs, the wins, the losses and much more.

I'm really happy that we gave Uri a shot.  He brings honest and thoughtful advice -- and I believe he cares about what he does and the footprint he leaves.
